ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter
Interface PublisherConnection

All Superinterfaces:
ParticipantConnection
All Known Implementing Classes:
PublishedSessionImpl, PublisherConnectionWrapper
public interface PublisherConnection
extends ParticipantConnection

A ParticipantConnection to the publisher of the document. Adds a single method used for abnormal termination of a published session caused by an fatal exception. If the sessionFailed method is called, it is likely an indication of a bug in the implementation.

Method Detail

sessionFailed

void sessionFailed(int reason,
                   Exception e)
Called by the ServerLogic on the publisher connection when there was a failure in the server part of the published session. The server logic shuts itself down after calling this method. Thus, the published session is unusable after this method is called.

Parameters:
reason - the failure code
e - the exception causing the failure

sendJoinRequest

void sendJoinRequest(JoinRequest request)
Passes the given join request to the publisher of the document.

Parameters:
request - the join request
